name: Sub Sonar (Exca)
description:
A game made during Pocket Jam #6 by Jussi Rislakki and Henri Sarasvirta.

Your goal is to go as far as you can down the water. Collect oxygen to stay alive and find green orbs to descend onto lower levels.

Control with either touch/mouse on red area or Z/Space WASD/arrows on pc. Use sonar pulse to ping for orbs. Boost allows you to move faster for a short moment.
